text: Elizabeth Peña (September 23, 1959 – October 14, 2014) was an Cuban-American actress and television director. She was known for her roles in The Incredibles, Rush Hour, Jacob's Ladder, and La Bamba. She was born in Elizabeth, New Jersey. Peña died at the age of 55 on October 14, 2014 at Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles, California from problems caused by cirrhosis. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1959 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from cirrhosis Category:Deaths from sepsis Category:Deaths from cardiopulmonary arrest Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Cuban actors Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:People from Elizabeth, New Jersey Category:Deaths from gastrointestinal hemorrhage
title: Elizabeth Peña
